T02D2439:50a-1: ma h'a mu dra pra g'i ti /
T02D2439:50a-3: phyag rgya chen po brda'i brgyud pa /
T02D2439:50a-4: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang //
T02D2439:50a-5: skyabs gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2439:50a-6: gyad kyi lus la dngul gyi ya lad gyon pa kun gyis lta bar mdzes //
T02D2439:50a-7: ta la'i mgo bcad rtsa ba de las myu gu skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:50a-8: ro ni sa yi 'og nas kang ka'i skad kyis 'byin par nus //
T02D2439:50a-9: gangg'a sgrol ba'i rkyal ba 'di la ces sbras bya bar rigs //
T02D2439:50a-10: skyes bu seng ge'i gsob mthong ba ni skal bar ldan //
T02D2439:50a-11: ging pa rang gis byed pa dar gyi srin bu snying re rje //
T02D2439:50a-12: ji ltar bros kyang grib ma 'di la gzugs kyis thar pa med //
T02D2439:50a-13: spu gri'i so la chags pa'i sbrang rtsi bldags nas phung bar nges //
T02D2439:50a-14: rdo yi mi 'di srin mo'i gling du bskyal kyang mi dga' med //
T02D2439:50a-15: gnyen po phyir 'phel 'dab chags skye ga go cha bzang //
T02D2439:50a-16: rin chen gter gyi thad kar nyal ba'i dbul mo snying re rje //
T02D2439:50a-17: shing rta brel pa'i rgyu ni 'khor lo'i sgram [*sgra ma] du chud pas len //
T02D2439:50a-18: rgyal po'i rjes gnang thob pa'i mi de gshed ma la mi 'jigs //
T02D2439:50a-19: rnga yab lag na thogs bzhin 'ja' ti dug sbrang phyir mi skrod //
T02D2439:50a-20: 'brug gi sgra med rma bya'i mngal du sgo nga chags mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:50a-21: ma ga dh'a ru dngul chu 'thungs pa des ni gangg'a rgal //
T02D2439:50a-22: li khri kha ru chud pa'i bsil ba thams cad mtshal du 'bab //
T02D2439:50a-23: gzeb nas thon nas gshed ma'i lag tu 'gro bar
T02D2439:50a-24: ma byed cig / lho ru rkun mo'i snying sha
T02D2439:50a-25: zo la drang srong rgyal mtshan phyi ru phud //
T02D2439:50a-26: ro la gser gyi phreng ba btags pa de yi gan du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
T02D2439:50a-27: sman mchog bsil mngar mi btsong min lus kyis btung bar bya //
T02D2439:50a-28: glang po'i rgyu she lcags kyus phrogs pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che ba yin //
T02D2439:50a-29: gdan sar bton pa rgyal bu'i lag nas tshangs pa'i
T02D2439:50a-30: skud pa da long cig / dmus long mig gis
T02D2439:50a-31: do lo ci 'dra'i lan ni thebs par mi 'gyur
T02D2439:50a-32: ro // dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung ba'i nor bu'i nus pa su las blangs pa yin //
T02D2439:50a-33: skom pa'i phyir ni lan tshva'i chu rgod 'thung ba'i mi de ltas ngan yin //
T02D2439:50a-34: dug las skyes pa'i srin bu 'di yis da khos man ngag bstan nas song //
T02D2439:50b-0: mu dra aa ga la btab pa'i gzugs de @50b gandha log tu shes par byos //
T02D2439:50b-1: ku ru kulle'i gnas su sgrol mas gsungs so /
T02D2439:50b-3: // / sgyu rtsal lus la med pa'i mi yis gyad kyi spyod pa dor ba rung //
T02D2439:50b-4: dri ma can gyi lus kyis tshangs pa'i sgo lnga nam yang mthong mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:50b-5: chu srin kha ru gru chu ded dpon 'di yi spyod pa da ltos dang //
T02D2439:50b-6: mu tig phreng ba padma'i skud pas zla ba'i dbus su sgyur par bya //
T02D2439:50b-7: shul dkar au shug la tshogs 'dron [?] po'i don ni nyi ma rgas pas shor //
T02D2439:50b-8: de mthong bdud ni mig phyis phyogs bzhir gad mo rta skad 'tsher //
T02D2439:50b-9: mkha' la 'phur ba'i nus pa 'das pa'i dus der bskams //
T02D2439:50b-10: mkhregs la mthur gzhol grung de shing rta brel ba gang gi stobs las byung //
T02D2439:50b-11: dug sbrul rke bcad nus pa med pa rnal 'byor pa yis gzigs //
T02D2439:50b-12: rnyog ma'i chu la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'char ba rab tu dka' //
T02D2439:50b-13: rkang pa chag pa'i rma dkris mgo la 'ching ba'i mi de 'ja' tri yin //
T02D2439:50b-14: rdza ba las rkang pa bkrus nas do la'i steng du 'dzegs pa bzang //
T02D2439:50b-15: rus sbal khog pa pha lam rdzas kyi rdo rjes bcag pa ngo mtshar che //
T02D2439:50b-16: ma gi ta yongs la brang 'gros lta bar mi nus so //
T02D2439:50b-17: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni ro dang lhan cig 'grogs pa min //
T02D2439:50b-18: nags la me mched phyogs bzhi'i rlung ni grogs su 'gyur //
T02D2439:50b-19: rgyal po'i btsun mo lha sras la ni skyo bar 'gyur ma yin //
T02D2439:50b-20: k'a ma r'u ru smyon pa'i chu la su yis 'thung bar nus //
T02D2439:50b-21: so ma btang ba'i rdza ni chu la skol bar mi bya'o //
T02D2439:50b-22: stag ni ri mo yod pas lan te rtag tu dgra dang 'grogs //
T02D2439:50b-23: bhandha med par gser 'gyur rtsi mchog rang dgar shes pa min //
T02D2439:50b-24: chung dus mi 'dzin bco lnga'i zla ba rgyas pa 'di la sgra gcan dbang //
T02D2439:50b-25: bu shi'i ma bu mthong ba'i 'gro ba bzang mo mya ngan rem //
T02D2439:50b-26: zhing pas chu lud brten las bon skyon med gdab par bya //
T02D2439:50b-27: ngar mchog dug la blud pa'i ral gri 'di la brdag [?] sa yod //
T02D2439:50b-28: smyon pa'i shul rdu 'brangs na snying gar yi ge sna tshogs 'char //
T02D2439:50b-29: mi 'gyur mkha' la lding ba'i bya tri 'di la gdams pa yod //
T02D2439:50b-30: byang phyogs kha ba can du phyin na 'gro la phan par 'gyur //
T02D2439:50b-31: dpal 'bras phung rang byung gi rtsar 'jam dpal gyis gsungs pa'o /
T02D2439:50b-33: // / yi ge'i phring [phreng?] ba nyi zla'i bar du dpa' bo'i spyan gyis blta bar gyis //
T02D2439:51a-1: kha dog nam bris 'di yi mkhan po su zhig yin //
T02D2439:51a-2: khab len rdo yi phyogs der lcags bran rgyug ste de la rig byed med //
T02D2439:51a-3: glang po'i mgo la rva med chag gis dogs pa'i sdug bsngal skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:51a-4: rgyal po'i gzeb tu tshud pa'i mid thar ram lde mig yid la bgyis //
T02D2439:51a-5: ging pa'i las byas sgyu ma'i dge slong la ni ltung bas gos mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:51a-6: wa dang glang po bung ba sha za seng ge smyon pa'i spyod 'gros ltos //
T02D2439:51a-7: skyon gyis ma gos dngul chu sta rus 'thung bar byed //
T02D2439:51a-8: gcig cig gcig la gcig pa nyid du shes par gyis //
T02D2439:51a-9: gzan du pha lam sgug pa'i bya de gang yin su yis mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:51a-10: mtshan ldan lus la sgyu rtsal ma sbyangs gyad du 'gyur ma yin //
T02D2439:51a-11: wa ti'i wa la grungs [*grung] yun ring na chu nyid drag par 'gyur //
T02D2439:51a-12: dang la sbu gris lce chod de dus khyod kyi kha nas rig byed thon //
T02D2439:51a-13: 'khri shing lo 'bras smin cing lci pas rgyas su
T02D2439:51a-14: ma 'jug cig rtsal gsum lus la rdzogs pa'i seng
T02D2439:51a-15: ge 'di la yang cung zad med //
T02D2439:51a-16: rgun 'brum tshal nas gram pa snyag pa'i spre'u snying re rje //
T02D2439:51a-17: chu nang rdo bor tshe na de dus zla ba gud du song ba med //
T02D2439:51a-18: dur ba gzeb kyi ri bong 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya //
T02D2439:51a-19: rdo yi mi la ngan du smras dang bsngags pa khyad par yod dam ci //
T02D2439:51a-20: lha rdzas shel la me chu gnyis ka 'byung ba ngo mtshar che //
T02D2439:51a-21: gal nad zas la rgyug pa'i sems can de ni snying rje'i yul //
T02D2439:51a-22: gyad kyis khrid kyang 'khor lo dang bral shing rtas lam mi chod //
T02D2439:51a-23: rkang la khong dril bud pa'i mi de blo sems bde //
T02D2439:51a-24: las su 'phangs pas zil gyis mi skyug go la phyir mi 'bod //
T02D2439:51a-25: dal ba'i dbang med rdza mkhan 'khor lo srub thag chod na bde //
T02D2439:51a-26: skyon gyis ma gos autpala chu nang skyes pa rang
T02D2439:51a-27: sar zhog / gshed mas bzung ba'i ltas ngan mi
T02D2439:51a-28: de rgyab tu mig mi blta //
T02D2439:51a-29: dud 'gro'i rgyal po'i gtsug gi nor bu'i thog ma gnas 'ong //
T02D2439:51a-30: ri bo bya rkang du spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs ba'o /
T02D2439:51a-32: // / tsandan chus bkrus lus kyi sprin med mkha' la gza' bral nyi ma ltos //
T02D2439:51a-33: srin mo'i bang du bu shor nye zho med par log pa'i mi de gang //
T02D2439:51a-34: nam zhig byi ba'i dug dang ma bral thar pa thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:51b-0: lag pa re rer me @51b long gnyis phyar byad de gang la lta ba yin //
T02D2439:51b-1: stod la mnan pa'i seng ge'i gam du spos kya glang po ga chad du //
T02D2439:51b-2: mchil lha ma steng du rkang bzhags steng thams cad de dus ko bas g-yogs //
T02D2439:51b-3: 'khor los sgyur rgyal gang du gshegs pa'i lam du rin chen gzhan rnams 'brang //
T02D2439:51b-4: pe ta ming gis bslus te bsgo ba nyan dus de dus de tshe gces par dor //
T02D2439:51b-5: bu ram tshal mthong rkang la khong sgril grol ba'i glang po sdod pa min //
T02D2439:51b-6: 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser la mu tig gis spras btsun mos btsongs na rin thang che //
T02D2439:51b-7: rlan can shing la rtsol bas srub pa'i mi de blun po yin //
T02D2439:51b-8: bye phrug lus la khrag chags de dus rma bya'i gnod yun ran //
T02D2439:51b-9: 'gro bar ma nus khar gzhong nang gi rus sbal tshi chad 'gyur //
T02D2439:51b-10: gcig la gcig brtan gshog pa med kyang gser sbrul mkha' la 'phur //
T02D2439:51b-11: shi yang bla yi nor bu ma len rgya mtsho'i phyir mi 'byung //
T02D2439:51b-12: bha yi drungs su myu gus bon bcad kyi rjes la bzang bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:51b-13: dmus long lag na me long phyar ba 'di la btsun mo bltas kyi dga' //
T02D2439:51b-14: snum gyis btsos pa'i ras la tshon gyi rtsi ni chags mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:51b-15: ti tsha byugs pa'i rdza ni so btang da ni
T02D2439:51b-16: bskol bas chog / mkhas pa yis ni stag gi
T02D2439:51b-18: rtsi mchog gser 'gyur bslabs pa'i drin can brjod par bya ba min //
T02D2439:51b-19: tshes gcig zla ba mi chung bco lnga'i dus na skyes pa med //
T02D2439:51b-20: bus pa g-yang khar song ba ma yi spyod 'gros ltos //
T02D2439:51b-21: mig 'di mgo la dgos pas phyung nas bza' bar mi bya'o //
T02D2439:51b-22: sha chags mi byung dus su gser gyi ral gri
T02D2439:51b-23: da phyung cig / rdo yi mi la 'gran dus
T02D2439:51b-24: de tshe snying la yi ge sna tshogs 'jug /
T02D2439:51b-25: gar mkhan spyod pa 'di yis man ngag thams cad
T02D2439:51b-26: bstan nas song // byang phyogs par ta ni ru phyin na 'gro la phan par 'gyur //
T02D2439:51b-27: 'byung po'i grong khyer tri stag tshang du phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o /
T02D2439:51b-29: // / gyad dang sbrags pa'i mi de shul du tsoo ra'i yang bral //
T02D2439:51b-30: ma tshig rdza la la cha mi 'go tsandan me la bsro bar bya //
T02D2439:51b-31: rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong po lo 'dab rgyas kyang don la skam po yin //
T02D2439:51b-32: gser gyi rtse'u mkha' la phyar ba 'di la glang po smyon pa 'bros //
T02D2439:51b-33: til mar rtse la dngul chu'i rgyun 'dzag 'di la seng ge bltas kyis dga' //
T02D2439:52a-1: mkhas pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu sdig mi sog /
T02D2439:52a-2: dur khrod nang du ce spyang ro dang phrad pa
T02D2439:52a-3: phyir mi ldog / sgeg mo rgyan gyis sbras pa
T02D2439:52a-4: me long lta ba rab tu brtson //
T02D2439:52a-5: rdo yi mi la su nye kho yi dgra bo gang yin khyod kyis smros //
T02D2439:52a-6: padma'i ge ser lag tu thogs la dus mtha'i nam mkha' ltos //
T02D2439:52a-7: ka la pingka'i sgra gdangs gter gyi steng du sgrogs na snyan //
T02D2439:52a-8: wa chu ma zad bar du chu 'thags [?] 'khor lo 'di la bsdad dbang med //
T02D2439:52a-9: gling gcig dag tu 'khor los sgyur rgyal gnyis su tshogs pa min //
T02D2439:52a-10: mkha' la nyi ma shar dus mun pa gud du yib bam ci //
T02D2439:52a-11: rin chen dngul gyi me long g-ya' mdag par ci ru rung //
T02D2439:52a-12: ma ga dh'a ru btsos pa'i ras ni kha dog gzhan bas gsal //
T02D2439:52a-13: rgyal po'i gam nas gshed ma'i phyogs su 'gro ba ltas ngan yin //
T02D2439:52a-14: mo gsham bu yi mdza' sde gang yin de yi bud med su //
T02D2439:52a-15: bzo yi sngon du thog mar zhun spyang gtong ba'i gser mkhan thabs la mkhas //
T02D2439:52a-16: mngal du mches pa'i glang po mche ba drug pa rgun 'brum mi 'dod la //
T02D2439:52a-17: rgyal po blta zhing rtse pa'i sems kyis spyan nas
T02D2439:52a-18: mchi ma yang yang 'dzag / dus mtha'i nam mkha'
T02D2439:52a-19: 'di la shar lho phyogs mtshams gang gis shes par
T02D2439:52a-20: 'gyur // yin par shes pa'i blo yis mon mo'i dug gi nus pa med par byed //
T02D2439:52a-21: zla ba bco lnga ma rgyas bar du rus wal las skyes sgong smin mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:52a-22: rkun po mdzod khang nang du rgyal po'i nyul mos bzung ba de ci sems //
T02D2439:52a-23: mig gi dbang po btsums nas mthong byed snying gi dbus su sad nas lta //
T02D2439:52a-24: brag las byung ba'i seng ge'i skad kyis chos rnams ma lus bstan nas song //
T02D2439:52a-25: rtsi mchog gser 'gyur shes pa'i mi de rlom sems sa khong du da chud cig //
T02D2439:52a-26: lang tang rtse ru gshin rje gshed kyis gsungs pa'o /
T02D2439:52a-28: // / gyad kyi sgyu rtsal 'di la dri ma'i zas gnod mkhas bas spangs bar bya'o //
T02D2439:52a-29: chu bo bzhi 'bab rgya mtsho phyir mi ldud pa ngo mtshar che ba yin //
T02D2439:52a-30: skyed du 'dzom pa'i glang po seng ge'i 'o ma 'thungs pas su yis thub par 'gyur //
T02D2439:52a-31: rlan bral rus sbal rgya mtsho mthong tshe de dus gzhan mi dran //
T02D2439:52a-32: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin gtong las byung 'bras bu gang du smin bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:52b-0: ma drug bu yi phyogs der tshangs dbang khyab @52b 'jug rnams kyi cod pan 'dud //
T02D2439:52b-1: seng ge'i mig gi dbus na yi ge aa yod pa de ltos dad kyi //
T02D2439:52b-2: 'ja' tri rin chen mchan du bcug nas chos bzad
T02D2439:52b-3: drag por 'jog / dug sbrul bang du byung tshe
T02D2439:52b-4: dog la yod par sbang bar bya //
T02D2439:52b-5: me long g-ya' dag gzugs brnyan 'char gyis rgyab tu min //
T02D2439:52b-6: ka ta ri las thar nas dong du zhugs pa'i mi de shin tu blun //
T02D2439:52b-7: rgya las grol nas 'dab chags rma bya rjes su zlog mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:52b-8: yan lag nang du bskums pas phyi ru dgra dang bral ba'i rus sbal thabs la mkhas //
T02D2439:52b-9: rtsi mchog spri yang 'thungs pa'i sbrul sha zos na bcud du 'gyur //
T02D2439:52b-10: rgya mtsho'i gling du ma phyin nor bu la ni blun pos cir mi mthong //
T02D2439:52b-11: padmas khrag ngoms chu yi nang 'dug sha yi phyir mi 'brang //
T02D2439:52b-12: khab tu byon pa'i btsun mos sngar gyi spyod pa dor bar bya //
T02D2439:52b-13: bu ram chu yis ras kyi dri ma rnams ni gting nas 'don par byad //
T02D2439:52b-14: gangs kyi ri yi snum ma zos na 'o ma mar du 'gyur //
T02D2439:52b-15: stag 'di ded pas mi zin bsdad kyi steng nas dgug par bya //
T02D2439:52b-16: bar ti ka na gser 'gyur rtse yi lo ma me ru 'bud //
T02D2439:52b-17: chu snod 'bum du zla ba 'bum 'char de dus zla ba gcig las med //
T02D2439:52b-18: byis pa aa ma mthong tshe bad du rgyug bas aa lu bor //
T02D2439:52b-19: yib sa med pa'i gser la ra yod ka 'ji'i rdo la snod //
T02D2439:52b-20: srin mo'i ral gri gyad kyis thogs pa de la pha rol 'jigs //
T02D2439:52b-21: nam mkha'i gos su gyon na snying gi dkyil du nyi ma 'char //
T02D2439:52b-22: rta mchog thur du rgyug pa skyes bu 'di yis gdams ngag bstan nas song //
T02D2439:52b-23: mdzes sdug rma bya'i thul pa phud na de yis thar pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2439:52b-24: bya rgod phung po'i ri la kharas p'a nis gsungs so /
T02D2439:52b-26: // / gyad kyis ma brgyugs phra mo'i pang la rgyal po bltas kyis dga' //
T02D2439:52b-27: tshos ma yis ni skyon med ras la kha dog tha dad ci 'dod shes //
T02D2439:52b-28: nyi ma mun par mthong ba'i mi de'i mig de cis lan de'o khyod kyis smros //
T02D2439:52b-29: phru gu mi dran sbrang rtsi mthong ba'i don la gnyid mi 'ong //
T02D2439:52b-30: khyu mchog 'og tu zhon nas seng ge'i 'o ma da 'thung shig //
T02D2439:52b-31: mdzes mas g-yos pa'i zas la dug mthong bzhin du ma 'thung dang //
T02D2439:52b-32: byis pa dang ni rgan pos chu nang zla ba 'di la so sor mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:53a-0: nam mkhas btsen [?] du gzung ba'i skyes bu 'di la gud @53a * //
T02D2439:53a-2: skad gsang mthon po'i sgra yis ye shes 'char dus khyod kyis bris //
T02D2439:53a-3: shel gong g-ya' dag gang gi steng du bzhag pa de yi mdog tu 'gyur //
T02D2439:53a-4: 'dul sbyong mkhan gyi gan du bu ram tshal nas bros pa'i glang po 'ja' tri yin //
T02D2439:53a-5: sbrul gyi tshong mthong len mkhan tsandan la ni ser sna skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:53a-6: rgyal po'i bka' rtags gnang ba'i mi de su la'ang de mi 'jigs //
T02D2439:53a-7: bung ba'i sgra la phag rgod nyan pa 'di ni phyag rgya che //
T02D2439:53a-8: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i nor bu 'di la mchod dang dgos 'dod 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:53a-9: phabs kyis gang la reg pa'i chen ni glum du 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D2439:53a-10: btsun mo'i mdza' sder gyur pa ma gsang gshed ma'i lag tu 'gro //
T02D2439:53a-11: dpag chen skyes bus gnam du mda' 'phangs 'di yi
T02D2439:53a-12: mgo la phog / rin po ches spras btsun mo'i
T02D2439:53a-13: sku la rgyan gyis sbud pa gnad mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:53a-14: sprin med mkha' la shar ba'i gza' skar phyogs der rgyal mo ka ra khyod kyis phyor //
T02D2439:53a-15: spre'u yi sder mo rnyed ba'i rus sbal lan tshva'i chu la lto 'gal med //
T02D2439:53a-16: tshal med sa la rtsol ba'i las rnams sdong 'dab yin te gser med phyir //
T02D2439:53a-17: smyug ma'i rtse la 'bras bu chags tshe nges ni rtsa ba rlag par gdon mi za //
T02D2439:53a-18: sgra rnams snying gi dbus na nyan pa'i phag rgod 'di yi spyod 'gros khyod kyis ltos //
T02D2439:53a-19: rgyal ma 'byongs pa'i skyes bus rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
T02D2439:53a-20: sa le sbram ni mtshur gyis gos tshe sngar gyi kha dog 'dor bar byed //
T02D2439:53a-21: seng ge'i rlid bus chos rnams ma lus bstan nas song ba do mtshar che //
T02D2439:53a-22: mun pa'i rum du me long ngos la byad kyi gzugs brnyan 'char mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:53a-23: klu sgrub kyi phug par sgrib pa rnam par sel bas gsungs pa'o /
T02D2439:53a-25: // / skom pas mchu dang mgul pa skams pa'i glang po chu dang phrad pas gzhan mi sems //
T02D2439:53a-26: til mar gyis bskus skra la me shor de dus sgeg mo bya gzhan dor //
T02D2439:53a-27: lus la lcags dbyug bsnun kyang rdo yi mi la mi dga'i rtog pa skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:53a-28: mnyen pa dgras ded gtsang po'i 'gram du gru dang phrad pa de ci sems //
T02D2439:53a-29: seng ge'i 'o ma rin chen snod las phal gyis thub mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:53a-30: thabs 'khyer mi de gang du blo ldan gyis zin de dus sems ngal sos //
T02D2439:53b-0: sgeg mo @53b yid 'phrog rmi lam bud med gang nas 'ongs nas gang du song //
T02D2439:53b-1: lan tshva chu la thim pas gzugs med ro yi dngos po stor mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:53b-2: sgo nga'i nang nas byung ba'i bye phrug mkha' la lta ba de ci sems //
T02D2439:53b-3: gling bzhi'i bya ba byas kyang nyi zla gnyis la skyo ngas dar cig med //
T02D2439:53b-4: rin chen bee d'u r+ya dang mching bu khyod kyis
T02D2439:53b-5: brje bar ma byed cig / rma bya btsan dug
T02D2439:53b-6: za ba bya gzhan rnams kyis thun mong ma yin
T02D2439:53b-7: no // rus sbal rlan las skyes kyang rgya mtsho mthong na de dus rab tu dga' //
T02D2439:53b-8: bor ba'i phyir skogs la ni ltos 'gro chags pa'i blo mi skya //
T02D2439:53b-9: thams la mkhas pa'i ded dpon rgya mtsho'i lam srang mkha' la 'tshol bar byed //
T02D2439:53b-10: lus la rme ba yong pa'i ri dags gcig pur sdod la ltos //
T02D2439:53b-11: rgun 'brum chang gis bzhi tshe btsun mo drung mi 'gro //
T02D2439:53b-12: mtshur gyis spangs pa'i ras ni kha dog bsgyur bar shes //
T02D2439:53b-13: 'o ma'i chu rgyun 'di la su 'thung mi de skal bar ldan par shes //
T02D2439:53b-14: sgong skyes tshang du bskyur nas phru gu mi gso 'dab chags khu byug drung //
T02D2439:53b-15: don gnyis mi byed gser 'gyur rtsi 'di shes pa'i dgos pa de dus stor //
T02D2439:53b-16: lang tsho bcu drug lon pa'i bu mo de yis bde ba smra ma shes //
T02D2439:53b-17: dug sbrul phag dang glang po'i spyod 'gros khyod kyis
T02D2439:53b-18: da ltos shig / chu yis chu ded bsdad dbang
T02D2439:53b-19: med de de la dal bar gang gis mthong //
T02D2439:53b-20: smyon pa'i lag nas ral gri 'brel pa'i mi de dba' bo yin //
T02D2439:53b-21: seng ge'i gsob mthong tshe na de dus snying la yi ge sna tshogs 'char //
T02D2439:53b-22: gri skor mkhan po de yis da res man ngag thams cad bstan nas song //
T02D2439:53b-23: dpal gyi ri la yi ge bsubs nas thabs des bden pa mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:53b-24: au rgyan tshando la'i gling du dpal rang byung gi rgyal mos gsungs pa'o /
T02D2439:53b-26: // / bil ba'i gong bu de ni gyad kyis brdabs na 'jig par gdon mi za //
T02D2439:53b-27: pha wang dred dang sha dag byed pa'i dgos pa gang yin khyod kyis smros //
T02D2439:53b-28: gar chang 'thung ba'i glang po smyon pa rang sar bzhag na srun //
T02D2439:53b-29: sman pa'i ngag la mi nyan nad pa gang gis gso bar nu sa ma yin //
T02D2439:53b-30: seng ge'i 'o ma 'thung tshe mchu la 'byar rtsi byugs na bcud du 'gyur //
T02D2439:53b-31: dug tshor zas la skyes bu chags pa'i blo ni skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:54a-0: ce spyang mig la nyin mtshan med de de yis @54a * //
T02D2439:54a-2: nom ba lus la med pa'i skyes bu gcer bu pa la dgra mi yong //
T02D2439:54a-3: dur khrod dbus kyi rdo yi mi de sha za'i
T02D2439:54a-4: ya nga bral nas 'dug / chu shing snying po
T02D2439:54a-5: rnyed pa'i mi de skyes bu su yis mthong bar
T02D2439:54a-6: 'gyur // gter mdzod dbyig gis khengs tshe de dus ded dpon blo sems bde bar snang //
T02D2439:54a-7: dbul pos nor bu rgyal po'i phyag tu phul ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2439:54a-8: skyes bu rtsol ba med pa'i pi wang la ni sgra skad 'byung mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:54a-9: gzings la gnas pa'i bya rog 'di las 'phur sa gud na med //
T02D2439:54a-10: mgo la mig phyung snying gi dkyil du sbas na phyi rol yi ger 'gyur //
T02D2439:54a-11: sems can rus sbal mig 'di btsums na gsal bas dbye bar 'phangs pa yin //
T02D2439:54a-12: sgyu ma'i gter mdzod 'di la mkhan po chags pa'i blo ni skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:54a-13: gser 'gyur rtsi yi rig byed 'di ni kun la mi ston mkhan po'i snying la sbed //
T02D2439:54a-14: chu 'khyags chab rom du gyur zhu tshe chu rang yin te go bar gyis //
T02D2439:54a-15: mkha' la 'char ba'i 'ja' yi mkhan po su yin 'di yi kha dog su yis bris //
T02D2439:54a-16: chu la chu bzhag gnyis su mi snang gang gis 'byed par nus pa mkhas //
T02D2439:54a-17: mkha' lding 'dab gshog rgyas pa'i ro de su yis 'phur bar nus //
T02D2439:54a-18: gang tshe gzings kyi thag pa brtul tshe de tshe ded dpon dgra gnyen gnyis dang bral //
T02D2439:54a-19: 'khor lo'i rgyug phyogs grib ma'i mtshams las 'da' mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:54a-20: mun rum nang du me bus 'od ni thog mar rang la 'char bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:54a-21: sko ma du seng ge'i snying khrag 'thungs pa'i mi de su yi rigs rgyud yin //
T02D2439:54a-22: jag rtsed mkhan po de yis man ngag thams cad bstan nas song ;
T02D2439:54a-23: / gru gnyis sna la rdog pa bzhag pa'i mi de 'gyel bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:54a-24: lho phyogs k'a ma r'u ru lha mo m'a ri tsyes gsungs pa'o /
T02D2439:54a-26: // / gser gling yid la bcangs pa'i ded dpon bong rdo'i khrod du sdod mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:54a-27: rdo yi shul du 'brang ba'i khyi yi spyod 'gros 'di la khyod kyis yang yang ltos //
T02D2439:54a-28: tshong khang du tshogs 'gron bo thad kar mi 'grogs rang rang gud du 'gro //
T02D2439:54a-29: nor bu'i phung po mthong tshe rus sbal la ni gces par 'dzin pa'i blo mi skye //
T02D2439:54a-30: klu mchog rnams kyi mgo bo ji snyed klad gzer skye ba'i rten //
T02D2439:54a-31: nang gi 'du ba gang yin rang srong gis ni phyi nas shes //
T02D2439:54b-0: rgyal po'i @54b dkor mdzod brkus pa mi smra 'chab pas kha tshags bsdams //
T02D2439:54b-1: snal chu mthong tsha thag pa sprul du 'dzin pa'i
T02D2439:54b-2: 'khrul pa ldog / sbrang rtsi'i ro mchog myong ba'i
T02D2439:54b-3: rnga mo rtsva yi zhen pa bral //
T02D2439:54b-4: sa yi 'og tu rno yi ngar blud spu gri sba bar 'phangs pa yin //
T02D2439:54b-5: nyi zla gza' skar rnams ni rgya mtsho dang ba'i ngang du 'char //
T02D2439:54b-6: khri snyan pags pa gyon pa'i mi des bgegs rnams bran du khol bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:54b-7: phyogs bzhir co do gshed mas zin pa'i mi de de dus gang la chags //
T02D2439:54b-8: skyes bu mdza' bos bslus pa'i mi de khong dub
T02D2439:54b-9: yid ches 'jig / shing gi skyes bus glang po'i
T02D2439:54b-10: mgo bcang de yi sdig pa gang du smin //
T02D2439:54b-11: mdongs rgyas pa yi rma bya dregs pas myos pa 'di ni ting 'dzin bzang //
T02D2439:54b-12: rgyal sras 'khrungs pa'i btsun mo la ni de dus lha rnams re ba che //
T02D2439:54b-13: na ga ra yis yi ge chu la bris ba su yis lhogs par 'gyur //
T02D2439:54b-14: lhung bzed khengs na rigs ngan bzhag la da ni seng ge'i bu dang sbrag //
T02D2439:54b-15: ci yang mi dgos shing skogs bar gyi sdom gyi spyod 'gros khyod kyis ltos //
T02D2439:54b-16: gser 'gyur rtsi shes dbul bar gnas ba'i mi de su yi rigs rgyud yin //
T02D2439:54b-17: rus sbal spu yi kha dog ci 'dra da res khyod kyis mo gsham bu la dris //
T02D2439:54b-18: me long nang gi byad de gzugs brnyan yin gyi rtog pa bral //
T02D2439:54b-19: gser 'di bzang po yin min ra 'di ka 'jis
T02D2439:54b-20: gsal bar 'dug / gang la rgyab pa mi sdug
T02D2439:54b-21: chod pa lha dbang lag gi sta re rno //
T02D2439:54b-22: mchil lham lag na thogs na dus der lham gyi dgos pa stor //
T02D2439:54b-23: dra ba dbang po'i gzhu yis chos rnams ma lus bstan nas song //
T02D2439:54b-24: mu tig phreng ba lto ru zo shig 'di yis don gnyis 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2439:54b-25: sing ga la'i tshal du kun du bzang pos gsungs pa'o /
T02D2439:54b-27: // / gyad kyi dpral ba'i nor bu ma mthong bzo rig mkhan pos bstan dus rnyed //
T02D2439:54b-28: chu bya'i phru gu 'di la sgo nga'i nang du rgya mtsho'i snang pa 'char bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:54b-29: tsandan me yis tshig pa'i sman du rma la de nyid bzang ba yin //
T02D2439:54b-30: shing rnams thams cad grib ma'i ngo bor gcig pas 'di la tha dad med //
T02D2439:54b-31: spos kyi glang po ste ka zos pa seng ge'i gdong du blta //
T02D2439:54b-32: 'dab bzangs rgyal po'i mchu la rtsi yod chu bo'i nang gi'i ma 'du //
T02D2439:55a-0: gsal shing rtse yi mi de nor la chags pa'i blo mi @55a * //
T02D2439:55a-2: sngags kyis zin pa'i ha la sman rnams kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2439:55a-3: rdo yi mi yi rig byed 'di la ltos dang ngo mtshar che ba yin //
T02D2439:55a-4: dug mda' snying la phog pa'i mi de su yis sos par 'gyur //
T02D2439:55a-5: sen mo'i bar du seng ldeng tsher ma zug pa'i mi de ting 'dzin bzang //
T02D2439:55a-6: mi ro mkha' la lta ba'i snying la ci sems khyod kyis da smros dang //
T02D2439:55a-7: skam du smyo chu 'thungs ba 'di yis rgyal po'i 'khor mi 'ong //
T02D2439:55a-8: nam mkha'i nu ma la ni 'o ma 'dod pa
T02D2439:55a-9: da bzhos shig / nor bu rin chen gang nas
T02D2439:55a-10: rnyed pa'i dus der dbul dang bral //
T02D2439:55a-11: gcig tu gyur pas ri rab drung du rma bya'i mdongs mi gsal //
T02D2439:55a-12: skyes bu gshed mas btang ba'i blo sems 'di la blta bar bya //
T02D2439:55a-13: dud 'gro'i khong du gser 'gyur rtsi zos rtsva gzhan dag dang khyad par med //
T02D2439:55a-14: do thag thams cad rtsal gyi phur pa 'di yis bzung ba yin //
T02D2439:55a-15: stobs ldan ded dpon gyis ni glang bo'i rgyab tu
T02D2439:55a-16: da khol cig / srin po'i kha nas rlung gis
T02D2439:55a-17: bskyod pa'i me ni rdo rje'i gdan la 'bar bar
T02D2439:55a-18: byed // 'di yis gdol pa'i grong rnams 'tshig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02D2439:55a-19: rnam pa du mar gyur kyang gar mkhan lus su gcig pa yin //
T02D2439:55a-20: gril nas lam du bum pa dngul chu'i thigs pas khengs pa'i tshe //
T02D2439:55a-21: de dus 'khor lo'i steng du dpa' bo rnams ni
T02D2439:55a-22: bzi ru chug / rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs 'khrugs dus
T02D2439:55a-23: thabs ldan rus sbal gting du 'bros //
T02D2439:55a-24: glang po'i mgul gyi dril bu 'di yis man ngag thams cad bstan nas song //
T02D2439:55a-25: sman gyi nags der drang srong gis ni dor bya rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:55a-26: dur khrod au tsa lar badzra b'a r'a h'i sa gsungs pa'o /
T02D2439:55a-28: // / gter gyi nang du gter tshud de dus mkha' la 'ja' tshon sna tshogs 'char //
T02D2439:55a-29: mthong dus de tshe khyod kyis khong du gzhu yi
T02D2439:55a-30: srad bu da phung cig / rang gis bcag pa'i
T02D2439:55a-31: gser la ka 'ji'i dgos pa mi bdog go //
T02D2439:55a-32: mthong snang dgra ru red pa gter srung mkhan po mel tse rab tu brtson //
T02D2439:55a-33: rgyal pos ma tshor ba la dur ba gseb tu bdung rtsi'i bum pa rang gis btung //
T02D2439:55a-34: sbrang rgod lto ru zos nas 'bras bu med par 'dod pa de ni shin tu blun //
T02D2439:55b-0: rdzi das la gnas pa'i ded dpon 'dod rlung byung ba de dus @55b rgyal mtshan 'phyar //
T02D2439:55b-1: bu ram shun pa 'de la yang yang bshus na mngar ba'i snying po rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D2439:55b-2: rmi lam du ni gter gyi bum pa rnyed pa de las da nas blun po du //
T02D2439:55b-3: gzan la bcum ba rgya khra 'di yis man ngag thams cad bstan nas song //
T02D2439:55b-4: gter mdzod rnyed pa'i mi des mdza' bo shi ba'i mya ngan dus der brjed //
T02D2439:55b-5: sha chags mis ded rkyal shes skyes bu gangg'a'i phyogs su 'bros //
T02D2439:55b-6: rus sbal rgyab kyi ri mos sus bris 'di yi mkhan po gang yin lo //
T02D2439:55b-7: ded dpon kha la mi nyan blo chung skal med nor bu rba dor len //
T02D2439:55b-8: nya btang ba yi skyar mo de dus mkha' la dgra yi 'jigs pa bral //
T02D2439:55b-9: rig byed gnod par mthong ba'i skal med de 'og
T02D2439:55b-10: rang sar zhog / khab len rdo 'di nam zhig
T02D2439:55b-11: btsun mo'i dgra ru ldang bas sa yi 'og tu
T02D2439:55b-12: sbos // gnad du mtshon phog dus der ri dags khyu nas dgar //
T02D2439:55b-13: nor bu gling la sa rdo btsal bas mi rnyed aa rangs rin po che //
T02D2439:55b-14: mkha' la rgyu skar gang yin lta na seng ge'i g-yang gzhi gon //
T02D2439:55b-15: gser 'gyur rtsi ngo ston pa'i drin can gang gis mnyes par byed par nus //
T02D2439:55b-16: thabs gzhan ma mchis rdzas chag dum bur bza' btung slong na dgyes //
T02D2439:55b-17: chu yi ro rnams rgya mtsho chen po der ni
T02D2439:55b-18: tha dad med de gcig / ro la mtshon gyis
T02D2439:55b-19: bsnun kyang de la mi dga'i rtog pa med //
T02D2439:55b-20: g-yul ngo nam sprod tshe na glang po'i mchu la ral gri gdags //
T02D2439:55b-21: ri brags bar du sdod pa'i gcan gzan seng ge 'di la gdams pa yod //
T02D2439:55b-22: zo chu 'khor lo 'di yis man ngag thams cad dus dar bstan //
T02D2439:55b-23: srin mo'i sogs pa mgul du thogs na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur //
T02D2439:55b-24: rdo rje gdan du mi g-yo bas gsungs pa'o //
T02D2439:55b-25: bde bar gshegs pa lung gi brgyud pa yi dam
T02D2439:55b-26: gyi lhas bstan pa 'dzam bu'i gling du sngon chad
T02D2439:55b-27: ma grags pa'o // sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags
T02D2439:55b-28: pa bla ma rgya gar nag gu'i zhal snga nas
T02D2439:55b-29: bod kyi bande zha ma lots'a bas byin rlabs kyi
T02D2439:55b-30: gnas mchog ding rir bsgyur te /
